attributes.action: Aberdeen beach leisure centre & Bucksburn swimming pool to stay open.
attributes.additional_details: We would strongly recommend it's reconsidered about the closing of these premises.
attributes.background: These are two premises that have the facilities for disability access. Please stop the closing & demolishing of these premises, it's also a historical part of Aberdeen that we do not want destroyed.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about closure of local leisure facilities are a matter for their operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.
